description: Try our easy to follow Stuffed Field Mushrooms recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Stuffed Field Mushrooms Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Wipe the mushrooms clean with a damp cloth. Remove and finely chop the steams.
Heat the olive oil in a saucepan, add the onion and heat for 3 minutes, or until onion has softened. Add the chopped mushroom stems, soy rashers, basil and soybeans and cook, stirring, for 5 minutes.
Spread 1 teaspoon of tomato pesto on the underside of each mushroom. Place on a tray and cook under a hot grill for 10 minutes, or until the mushrooms have softened.
Spoon the soy bean mixture with the balsamic vinegar onto mushrooms and serve immediately.
